name: Action Surge
benefit_text: You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls you make during any action you gained by spending an action point.

name: Agile Hunter
benefit_text: When you score a critical hit with a melee attack against the target of your Hunter’s Quarry, you can shift as a free action, and the enemy takes a –2 penalty on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

name: Alertness
benefit_text: You don’t grant enemies combat advantage during surprise rounds.You also gain a +2 feat bonus to Perception checks.

name: Armor of Bahamut
benefit_text: You can invoke the power of your deity to use armor of Bahamut.

name: Armor Proficency (Chainmail)
benefit_text: You gain training with chainmail.

name: Armor Proficency (Hide)
benefit_text: You gain training with hide armor.

name: Armor Proficency (Leather)
benefit_text: You gain training with leather armor.

name: Armor Proficency (Plate)
benefit_text: You gain training with plate armor.

name: Armor Proficency (Scale)
benefit_text: You gain training with scale armor.

name: Astral Fire
benefit_text: You gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls when you use a power that has the fire or radiant keyword. At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2. At 21st level, it increases to +3.

name: Avandra's Rescue
benefit_text: You can invoke the power of your deity to use Avandra’s rescue.

name: Backstabber
benefit_text: The extra damage dice from your Sneak Attack class feature increase from d6s to d8s.

name: Blade Opportunist
benefit_text: You gain a +2 bonus to opportunity attack rolls with a heavy blade or a light blade.

name: Burning Blizzard
benefit_text: You gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls when you use a power that has the acid or cold keyword. At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2. At 21st level, it increases to +3.

name: Combat Reflexes
benefit_text: You gain a +1 bonus to opportunity attack rolls.

name: Corellon's Grace
benefit_text: You can invoke the power of your deity to use Corellon’s grace.

name: Dark Fury
benefit_text: You gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls when you use a power that has the necrotic or psychic keyword. At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2. At 21st level, it increases to +3.

name: Defensive Mobility
benefit_text: You gain a +2 bonus to AC against oppor- tunity attacks.

name: Distracting Shield
benefit_text: If you hit a foe with an attack granted by your Combat Challenge class feature, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

name: Dodge Giants
benefit_text: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and Reflex defense against the attacks of Large or larger foes.

name: Dragonborn Frenzy
benefit_text: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls.

name: Dragonborn Senses
benefit_text: You gain low-light vision. You gain a +1 feat bonus to Perception checks.

name: Durable
benefit_text: Increase your number of healing surges by two.

name: Dwarven Weapon Training
benefit_text: You gain proficiency and a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with axes and hammers.

name: Eladrin Soldier
benefit_text: You gain proficiency with all spears and a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with longswords and all spears.

name: Elven Precision
benefit_text: When you use the elven accuracy power, you gain a +2 bonus to the new attack roll.
